Option: general.demo

This option should contain true/false.

If this option is set to true, no critical file operations can be performed by the user, action such as upload and delete. The user will be promted with a message (general.demo_msg) when trying to execute one of these actions.

Example of usage in the config.php file:

$mcImageManagerConfig['general.demo'] = false;

Example of usage in a mc_access file:

general.demo=false
